name: Untitled Repair Game
description:
Houston, we have a problem!

In this minigame, you play as an astronaut in the midst of a meteor shower. Maintain and repair both your space shuttle and communication tower from the oncoming meteors for as long as possible. 

Use arrow keys to move. 

This game was designed and created for Global Game Jam 2020 with the theme, "Repair." Show your support with a "Heart" on our page! https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/untitled-repair-game-8
